# key

**Instance Property**

The key for a mutable metadata item.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var key: (any NSCopying & NSObjectProtocol)? { get set }
```

## Accessing keys and key spaces

- **keySpace**: The key space of the metadata item’s key.
